speaker: RIVERS
text:
Sir
               
              Richard
               
              Ratcliffe
              ,
               
              let
               
              me
               
              tell
               
              thee
               
              this
              :

speaker: RIVERS
text:
Today
               
              shalt
               
              thou
               
              behold
               
              a
               
              subject
               
              die

speaker: RIVERS
text:
For
               
              truth
              ,
               
              for
               
              duty
              ,
               
              and
               
              for
               
              loyalty
              .

speaker: GREY
text:
God
               
              bless
               
              the
               
              Prince
               
              from
               
              all
               
              the
               
              pack
               
              of
               
              you
              !

speaker: GREY
text:
A
               
              knot
               
              you
               
              are
               
              of
               
              damnèd
               
              bloodsuckers
              .

speaker: VAUGHAN
text:
You
               
              live
               
              that
               
              shall
               
              cry
               
              woe
               
              for
               
              this
               
              hereafter
              .

speaker: RATCLIFFE
text:
Dispatch
              .
               
              The
               
              limit
               
              of
               
              your
               
              lives
               
              is
               
              out
              .

speaker: RIVERS
text:
O
               
              Pomfret
              ,
               
              Pomfret
              !
               
              O
               
              thou
               
              bloody
               
              prison
              ,

speaker: RIVERS
text:
Fatal
               
              and
               
              ominous
               
              to
               
              noble
               
              peers
              !

speaker: RIVERS
text:
Within
               
              the
               
              guilty
               
              closure
               
              of
               
              thy
               
              walls
              ,

speaker: RIVERS
text:
Richard
               
              the
               
              Second
               
              here
               
              was
               
              hacked
               
              to
               
              death
              ,

speaker: RIVERS
text:
And
              ,
               
              for
               
              more
               
              slander
               
              to
               
              thy
               
              dismal
               
              seat
              ,

speaker: RIVERS
text:
We
               
              give
               
              to
               
              thee
               
              our
               
              guiltless
               
              blood
               
              to
               
              drink
              .

speaker: GREY
text:
Now
               
              Margaret’s
               
              curse
               
              is
               
              fall’n
               
              upon
               
              our
               
              heads
              ,

speaker: GREY
text:
When
               
              she
               
              exclaimed
               
              on
               
              Hastings
              ,
               
              you
              ,
               
              and
               
              I
              ,

speaker: GREY
text:
For
               
              standing
               
              by
               
              when
               
              Richard
               
              stabbed
               
              her
               
              son
              .

speaker: RIVERS
text:
Then
               
              cursed
               
              she
               
              Richard
              .
               
              Then
               
              cursed
               
              she
               
              Buckingham
              .

speaker: RIVERS
text:
Then
               
              cursed
               
              she
               
              Hastings
              .
               
              O
              ,
               
              remember
              ,
               
              God
              ,

speaker: RIVERS
text:
To
               
              hear
               
              her
               
              prayer
               
              for
               
              them
               
              as
               
              now
               
              for
               
              us
              !

speaker: RIVERS
text:
And
               
              for
               
              my
               
              sister
               
              and
               
              her
               
              princely
               
              sons
              ,

speaker: RIVERS
text:
Be
               
              satisfied
              ,
               
              dear
               
              God
              ,
               
              with
               
              our
               
              true
               
              blood
              ,

speaker: RIVERS
text:
Which
              ,
               
              as
               
              thou
               
              know’st
              ,
               
              unjustly
               
              must
               
              be
               
              spilt
              .

speaker: RATCLIFFE
text:
Make
               
              haste
              .
               
              The
               
              hour
               
              of
               
              death
               
              is
               
              expiate
              .

speaker: RIVERS
text:
Come
              ,
               
              Grey
              .
               
              Come
              ,
               
              Vaughan
              .
               
              Let
               
              us
               
              here
               
              embrace
              .

speaker: RIVERS
text:
Farewell
               
              until
               
              we
               
              meet
               
              again
               
              in
               
              heaven
              .
